page.title: 14A day at Aston St.Mary's
page.content: My day starts at 7 O'CLOCK. I go down stairs and have a bowl of cornflakes and a cup of tea.I wash, put on my summer school uniform,a blue checked cotton dress and white socks and read untill 8.45.I only live across the road from school so I meet my friends at the gates.The bell goes at 9.00 we line up and go in.The register is cal_ led and we sing a hymn in class or h_ ave assembley,then we drink a carton of milk.After play we do English and Maths.For lunch we have a choice of meals like Shepherd's Pie and cabbage, followed by Chocolate cracknel(rice krispies in thick chocolate). Next we play skipping,football and chasing the boys.In the afternoon it's topic,R.E., or sports and home at 3.3O.On Wednes- days I go to the youth club in village hall.There is a Guides company,but I don't go.
